data.title: St. Mary the Virgin
data.meta_description: The Church of St. Mary the Virgin, Chappaqua, New York
data.text:
Worship

We are a Eucharist-centered parish, strengthened by the shared celebration of Holy Communion, testimony to the real presence of Christ in our lives. Sunday worship is the cornerstone of St. Mary's community, as we gather together to reflect, rejoice, and pray.

​

​

Music

We believe that music is an essential part of our worship experience and are proud of our program. St. Mary's is rich in music from a variety of genres that span several centuries. In addition to music at Sunday worship and Evensong, St. Mary's also hosts individual concerts throughout the year.

​

​
